languages.text: "Быть может, если бы Теодора уделяла больше времени "мелочам", то не была бы сейчас мертва. Теперь здесь новый Лорд-капитан, и я не буду повторять ее ошибок".
"Maybe if Theodora had spent more time on 'trifling' matters, she wouldn't have wound up dead. There is a new Lord Captain aboard this ship now, and I will not repeat her mistake."
languages.original_text: "Быть может, если бы Теодора уделяла больше времени "мелочам", то не была бы сейчас мертва. Теперь здесь новый Лорд-капитан, и я не буду повторять ее ошибок".

traits.locale_text: "Maybe if Theodora had spent more time on 'trifling' matters, she wouldn't have wound up dead. There is a new Lord Captain aboard this ship now, and I will not repeat her mistake."
"Maybe if Theodora had spent more time on 'trifling' matters, she wouldn't have wound up dead. There is a new Lord Captain aboard this ship now, and I will not repeat her mistake."
"Maybe if Theodora had spent more time on 'trifling' matters, she wouldn't have wound up dead. There is a new Lord Captain aboard this ship now, and I will not repeat her mistake."
"Maybe if Theodora had spent more time on 'trifling' matters, she wouldn't have wound up dead. There is a new Lord Captain aboard this ship now, and I will not repeat her mistake."

languages.text: “如果西奥多拉能在这些‘琐事’上多花些时间，说不定她就不会死了。如今这艘船有了新的领主舰长，我可不打算重蹈她的覆辙。”
languages.original_text: "Maybe if Theodora had spent more time on 'trifling' matters, she wouldn't have wound up dead. There is a new Lord Captain aboard this ship now, and I will not repeat her mistake."

traits.locale_text: “如果西奥多拉能在这些‘琐事’上多花些时间，说不定她就不会死了。如今这艘船有了新的领主舰长，我可不打算重蹈她的覆辙。”

languages.text: «Tal vez si Theodora hubiera dedicado más tiempo a los asuntos "insignificantes", no habría acabado muerta. Ahora hay un{mf||a} nuev{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán a bordo, y yo no pienso repetir sus errores».
languages.original_text: "Maybe if Theodora had spent more time on 'trifling' matters, she wouldn't have wound up dead. There is a new Lord Captain aboard this ship now, and I will not repeat her mistake."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez si Theodora hubiera dedicado más tiempo a los asuntos "insignificantes", no habría acabado muerta. Ahora hay un{mf||a} nuev{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán a bordo, y yo no pienso repetir sus errores».

languages.text: 「シオドーラがもっと『些細なこと』に時間を費やしていれば、彼女は死なずに済んだかもしれない。今、この船には新しいロード・キャプテンが乗っているが、彼女の過ちは繰り返さない」
languages.original_text: "Maybe if Theodora had spent more time on 'trifling' matters, she wouldn't have wound up dead. There is a new Lord Captain aboard this ship now, and I will not repeat her mistake."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラがもっと『些細なこと』に時間を費やしていれば、彼女は死なずに済んだかもしれない。今、この船には新しいロード・キャプテンが乗っているが、彼女の過ちは繰り返さない」

languages.text: "Hätte Theodora mehr Zeit mit 'unbedeutenden' Angelegenheiten zugebracht, wäre sie nicht gestorben. Es gibt auf diesem Schiff nun einen neuen Lord Captain, und ich werde ihren Fehler nicht wiederholen."
languages.original_text: "Maybe if Theodora had spent more time on 'trifling' matters, she wouldn't have wound up dead. There is a new Lord Captain aboard this ship now, and I will not repeat her mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Hätte Theodora mehr Zeit mit 'unbedeutenden' Angelegenheiten zugebracht, wäre sie nicht gestorben. Es gibt auf diesem Schiff nun einen neuen Lord Captain, und ich werde ihren Fehler nicht wiederholen."

languages.text: « Si Théodora s'était un peu plus préoccupée des affaires "courantes", elle ne se serait peut-être pas fait assassiner. Désormais, c'est moi {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de ce vaisseau, et je ne referai pas la même erreur. »
languages.original_text: "Maybe if Theodora had spent more time on 'trifling' matters, she wouldn't have wound up dead. There is a new Lord Captain aboard this ship now, and I will not repeat her mistake."

traits.locale_text: « Si Théodora s'était un peu plus préoccupée des affaires "courantes", elle ne se serait peut-être pas fait assassiner. Désormais, c'est moi {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de ce vaisseau, et je ne referai pas la même erreur. »

languages.text: "Theodora, bu 'önemsiz' meselelere zaman ayırsaydı şimdi aramızda olurdu. Artık bu geminin yeni bir Lord Kaptan'ı var. Geçmişte yapılan hataları tekrar edecek değilim."
languages.original_text: "Maybe if Theodora had spent more time on 'trifling' matters, she wouldn't have wound up dead. There is a new Lord Captain aboard this ship now, and I will not repeat her mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora bu 'önemsiz' meselelerle daha çok uğraşsaydı şimdi aramızda olurdu. Artık bu geminin yeni bir Lord Kaptan'ı var. Eski hataları tekrar edecek değilim."
